English: {0} to Type, {1} for Map, {2} for Coms
Description:
This is a helper text for the in-game chat. "{0}" represents the designated key for starting to type chat messages.  
"{1}" represents the designated key for showing the in game map,  "{2}" represents the designated key for showing a Communications menu. 

Coms is short for Communications

French.Translation: {0} pour écrire, {1} pour ouvrir la carte, {2} pour communiquer

Italian.Translation: {0} per digitare, {1} per mappa, {2} per comunicare

German.Translation: {0} zum Tippen, {1} für die Karte, {2} für die Kommandoliste

Spanish.Translation: {0} para escribir, {1} para mapa, {2} para comunicarse

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: {0} para digitar, {1} para o mapa, {2} para as frases

Japanese.Translation: {0} でタイプ、 {1} でマップ、 {2} で定型文

name: GameEventLog.A_Type_C_Map_D_Comms
